alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 9:56AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect central Geauga...Lake and southwestern Ashtabula Counties Until 1130 AM EST.... At 956 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from near Willowick to near Middlefield, moving east at 30 mph. This band will continue wobble across area with individual bursts of snow moving east at 20 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 30 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Up to 2 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Painesville, Willowick, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Euclid, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Geneva, Madison, Perry, Orwell, Timberlake, Lakeline, Chesterland, Wickliffe, Richmond Heights, Willoughby Hills and Mentor-On-The-Lake. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 314, 315, 326, 330, 331, and 332.
